message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1150000. This is a fair price considering the value it holds for you. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1050000 for your product. I believe this price reflects its true value while allowing us to reach an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer but I'm not able to go that low.  $1100000 is the lowest I can go, considering the value of this product. I believe this still represents a great deal for you. What do you say?
I understand your position, Alice. Thank you for your flexibility. I would like to counter with an offer of $1075000 for your product. I believe this offers a fair compromise between our positions.
